sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Good afternoon and welcome to Euronews Now. It's Friday the 13th of May.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: I'm Andrea Bolaito and these are your top stories this hour.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Russia will stop transporting gas through part of the Yamal pipeline, closing another supply route for Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And Finland fears its gas could be turned off in retaliation for its NATO application.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: NATO application. International leaders need to prepare for the war in Ukraine to last and consider its long-term consequences, France's foreign minister warns on the second day of the G7 summit.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's armed forces say Russia is continuing to launch airstrikes on embattled Mariupol, determined to block the Ukrainian fighters holding out at the steelworks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Russia is to cut off gas supplies to Europe through its Yamal pipeline after imposing sanctions on the operator of the Polish section of the conduit.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The move closes another supply route to Europe, resulting in yet more rises in the cost of energy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Two weeks ago, Russia cut off gas supplies to Poland and Bulgaria over their refusal to pay in rubles.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Germany, which relies heavily on Russian supplies, has condemned Moscow's latest action.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Overall, it has to be said, the situation is worsening to the extent that proclamations of the use of gas and oil as a weapon are now coming true in various places.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Poland has already accused the Russian supplier Gazprom of a breach of contract over the cut-offs, but the company in turn has accused European countries of breaching their contracts by preventing it from operating pipelines or companies in which it holds shares.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Germany's economic and climate minister says that Russian sanctions on foreign energy companies

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: is a clear indication that energy is increasingly being used by Moscow as a weapon against the West.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: In Germany, Gazprom and its subsidiaries are affected.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: That means some of the subsidiaries are now no longer getting gas from Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: But the market offers other alternatives.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: They supply themselves with other gas on the market.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: According to Habeck, the German government also sees the weaning off of Russian energy sources as an opportunity for the future in terms of environmental policy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: There is a direct line from saying goodbye to fossil fuels from Russia to saying goodbye to fossil fuels from Russia to saying goodbye to fossil fuels altogether.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: That means expanding renewable energies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: During a meeting with Habeck in Berlin, Ukraine's Foreign Minister Dmytro Kaleba called on all German companies still doing business in Russia to withdraw and move their operations to Ukraine instead.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The EU is promising more military support for Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The news comes as foreign ministers from the group of seven leading economies gathered on Friday to continue talks in northern Germany.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Top of the agenda are the Russian invasion and its global impact, particularly on food and energy prices. The meeting has been hosted by the German Foreign Minister Annalena Baerbock, who said the conflict has become a world crisis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: I will announce that we at the European Union, we will provide a new tranche of 500 more millions to support military Ukraine. These 500 million will be allocated to heavy arms.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: We had at that moment provided armored cars, tanks, heavy artillery and munition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: UK Foreign Minister Liz Truss stressed the importance of keeping up the pressure Chars, tanks, heavy artillery, ammunition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: UK Foreign Minister Liz Truss stressed the importance of keeping up the pressure on Vladimir Putin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The foreign ministers of Ukraine and Moldova were also invited to take part in the meeting.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Defenders of the Asovstal Steelworks have released this video which they say shows the heavy fighting that continues to rage in the last Ukrainian stronghold in the city of Mariupol.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: With civilians evacuated, the fate of the plant's defenders remains unknown.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It's believed there are several hundred wounded Ukrainian soldiers with no medical supplies still holed up in the factory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian authorities say they are continuing their diplomatic efforts to rescue those fighters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, their families are demanding urgent action for a solution to allow their family members to live alive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: What is happening there is not a war is a massacre this is a violation of any convention this is just the killing of the people who are surrounded in the east many cities continue to see Russian troops approaching the shelling of the town of Bakhmut continues and some of the surrounding towns have already been taken.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The population is trying to get on with their lives, but they know that their freedom is hanging by a thread.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: While the Russians announce their discreet and steady advances into Ukrainian territory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Their situation remains grim for children, however however despite continued Russian shelling Ukrainians organized lessons for the children while schools remain closed or are destroyed but the psychological difficulties from the war and limited access to the internet it's a challenge for students to keep up with their studies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Feminist band and fierce Kremlin critics Pussy Riot kicked off their European tour in the German capital Berlin on Thursday night. The four are as well known for their activism as their music, and their performance at the Funkhaus was as much art protest as entertainment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Pussy Riot anti-war tour is inspired by the book Riot Days, written by band member Maria Alyukhina, and is part music, part theatre and part video.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Alyakina had been under house arrest in Russia because of an Instagram post.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In September last year, she was sentenced to a year's restricted movement on charges of inciting demonstrations for Alexei Navalny, the chief opposition critic of Vladimir Putin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It was feared she wouldn't be able to perform on the tour, but earlier this week Alya Kina made a daring escape from Russia by disguising herself as an employee of a food delivery company travelling through neighbouring Belarus and on to Lithuania.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The 19-date tour also includes shows in the Netherlands, Spain and Portugal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: I will always find my way home even if all roads are destroyed. They sang on stage in order to perform in Turin and to leave Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The Kalush Orchestra got special permission, but it wasn't a choice that everyone made.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: A member of the band decided to stay in Ukraine to fight.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Let's meet the Kalush Orchestra, representing a country at war here in Turin at the Eurovision Song Contest.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It is a very important moment for us because as we are qualifying here to the final, Ukrainian culture is at risk.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It has been killed, destroyed in our homeland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: But we're here to say that it's alive, it's unique.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: How does it feel to perform here in Turin in a happy atmosphere while in Ukraine people are fighting?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: during in a happy atmosphere while in Ukraine people are fighting? There are multiple air raid alerts every day in the region where my family and my friends are.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: There are rockets flying over our houses.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: It really is like a lottery.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: You never know when your house will be hit by a rocket.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: So of course it's very stressful.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But we are here and we are very focused on rehearsals and preparations right now.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: We are focused on conveying our message about the uniqueness and beauty of Ukrainian culture.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Bookmakers say you are the favorites.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: If you win next year, Ukraine will host the next edition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Can you imagine it?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: We hope that if Ukraine hosts Eurovision next year, it will be a united, rebuilt and peaceful Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Can you share with us a few seconds of your song, Stefania?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: I was taken by a strong storm, two waves, as if they were balls.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: They knew me very well, I was not deceived, as if I was very tired, they put me in tact.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Stefania De Michele, Kalush Orchestra, Euronews, Turin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Still to come on Euronews now, more top stories and analysis from Europe and the rest of the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Stay with us.
